code: import{API}from"../../config";export var getStripeKey=function getStripeKey(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/getStripeKey")).then(function(res){return res.json;}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};export var processPayment=function processPayment(amount,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/processPayment"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify({amount:amount})}).then(function(res){return res.json;}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};
